title: Position ceiling
context: [ยง37-68.5] Position ceiling. Whenever this part requires a position ceiling to be specified: (1) The number of permanent positions and temporary positions shall be separately identified; and (2) The position ceiling shall be expressed in units or fractions of full-time equivalent positions. [L 2015, c 160, ยง2] Note Applicability of section. L 2015, c 160, ยง11.
